title: Need help. Game won't let me move.
body: My game has been doing this to me for the last 2 hours. I can see the chat and stuff, it won't let me spawn. Minion waves are frozen and it's like i have disconnected but it won't show it to me.  I can talk in chat and others can clearly see it as well. This wasn't a issue yesterday or ever to be honest. Anybody got a solution to fix this from ruining my game?

replies.body: This is an excellent example of packet loss/lag. The two options you have in front of you is to run through our [**CONNECTION GUIDE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) or to hit me up in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and I'll investigate the matter with you.
